home.name: Nwanganga Emmanuel
home.description:
I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer and an ISTQB certified Software Test Engineer passionate about building responsive, high-performance web applications and ensuring end-to-end software quality. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, React, and modern databases, I develop scalable solutions backed by clean, testable code.

Transforming ideas into elegant, high-performing solutions with a strong focus on scalability, quality, and user experience.

about.title: Get to Know Me Better
about.subtitle: A passionate software engineer with a focus on quality-driven development and testing.

background.text1: I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer and Software Test Engineer passionate about building responsive, high-performance web applications and ensuring end-to-end software quality. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, React, and modern databases, I develop scalable solutions backed by clean, testable code.
background.text2: As an ISTQB-certified tester, I also specialize in automated testing, CI/CD integration, and continuous quality assurance across development pipelines.
background.text3: I'm passionate about delivering high-quality, maintainable software by combining development and test automation practices. Experienced in Test Automation, I ensure that every feature I build or test is robust, efficient, and production-ready.

education.title: Education
education.degree: BSc in Computer Science Engineering (Software Technology)
education.bootcampDesc: Focused on QA methodologies, automation frameworks, and test management using Jira, Selenium, and TestNG
education.aspnet: ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework Development
education.aspnetDesc: Comprehensive training in backend development with C#, .NET Core, and database integration
education.cloudDesc: Introduction to cloud architecture, services, and deployment principles (AWS / Azure fundamentals)
education.javaDesc: Advanced concepts in Java, RESTful APIs, Spring Boot, and full-stack application development

experience.dss: Software Test Engineer â€” DSS Consulting
experience.dssDesc: Led end-to-end QA for diverse client applications, including e-commerce, finance, and mobile platforms. My role combined manual, exploratory, and automated testing under tight deadlines, ensuring high-quality deliverables across multiple environments.
experience.proofitDesc: Contributed to the verification and validation of web and mobile applications across various industries, ensuring quality, reliability, and usability before release.
experience.africsmart: Full-Stack Software Engineer â€” Africsmart International Ltd
experience.africsmartDesc: Designed and developed scalable web applications using Java, Spring Boot, and React. Implemented REST APIs, authentication, and responsive UIs to improve business process efficiency.
experience.freelanceDesc: Build and maintain responsive websites and web apps. Focused on clean UI design, performance optimization, and accessibility.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of some of my software engineering and testing work.

lms.title: Leave Management System
lms.description: A full-stack web application built with ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework for managing employee leave requests, approvals, and allocations.

redditverse.title: RedditVerse
redditverse.description: A social web application inspired by Reddit, enabling users to create posts, comment, and upvote/downvote content. Focused on backend logic and clean UI.

trackstack.title: Track Stack
trackstack.description: A developer-oriented productivity tracker app integrating task management and skill progression tracking, supporting RESTful APIs and persistent data storage.

flight.title: Flight Booking Automation
flight.description: End-to-end automated test suite using Selenium and TestNG for a flight booking web app, verifying search, booking, and confirmation workflows.

etee.title: ETEE Elements Automation
etee.description: Automated UI regression testing framework for verifying form interactions and elements visibility across pages using Selenium and TestNG.

leftSide.title: Let's Connect
leftSide.description: I'm open to software development, testing, or freelance opportunities. Feel free to reach out or connect via any of the platforms below.

footer.description: Full-Stack Software Engineer & Software Test Engineer specializing in building scalable, high-performance web applications and ensuring software quality through automated testing and CI/CD best practices.
